item.title: On the Sovereignty of CryptoCurrencies -- What Bitcoin can Learn from Somaliland
item.description: Anarchy isn't great. People are not immune to the system. These are things which adding a nice payment protocol and some interesting cryptographic hashes does not change.

item.title: How I Would Structure Automatic Virtual Contracts
item.description: EAutomatic contracts have been occupying a great deal of my free mental energies for the past few weeks since I first learned that there are platforms in the works that will allow for such things to happen. My thoughts on this are quite nascent, as is the technology, but here are my early observations.
